trans-unit.source: RuleDescription
trans-unit.target: RuleDescription

trans-unit.source: <ui>RuleDescription</ui> represents a rule for processing messages.
trans-unit.target: <ui>RuleDescription</ui> represents a rule for processing messages.

trans-unit.source: Service Bus matches messages with the filter represented by its <legacyItalic>Filter</legacyItalic> property and performs action represented by its <legacyItalic>Action</legacyItalic> property against the messages that matched the filter.
trans-unit.target: Service Bus matches messages with the filter represented by its <legacyItalic>Filter</legacyItalic> property and performs action represented by its <legacyItalic>Action</legacyItalic> property against the messages that matched the filter.

trans-unit.source: RuleDescription Properties
trans-unit.target: RuleDescription Properties

trans-unit.source: The rule description contains the following properties.
trans-unit.target: The rule description contains the following properties.

trans-unit.source: Filter: <parameterReference>SqlFilter, TrueFilter /FalseFiilter, CorrelationFilter</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: Filter: <parameterReference>SqlFilter, TrueFilter /FalseFiilter, CorrelationFilter</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: The <legacyItalic>Filter</legacyItalic> property references an instance of Filter that is evaluated against a message.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyItalic>Filter</legacyItalic> property references an instance of Filter that is evaluated against a message.

trans-unit.source: The following types of filters are provided:
trans-unit.target: The following types of filters are provided:

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>SqlFilter</parameterReference>: A type of Filter that is represented by SQL expression.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>SqlFilter</parameterReference>: A type of Filter that is represented by SQL expression.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about SqlFilter syntax, see <externalLink><linkText>SqlFilter.SqlExpression Property</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.sqlfilter.sqlexpression.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed information about SqlFilter syntax, see <externalLink><linkText>SqlFilter.SqlExpression Property</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.sqlfilter.sqlexpression.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>TrueFilter/FalseFiilter</parameterReference>: A handy shortcut for always returning true or false.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>TrueFilter/FalseFiilter</parameterReference>: A handy shortcut for always returning true or false.

trans-unit.source: They are a type of <legacyItalic>SqlFilter</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: They are a type of <legacyItalic>SqlFilter</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>CorrelationFilter</parameterReference>: A type of Filter that matches <legacyItalic>CorrelationId</legacyItalic> property of <legacyItalic>BrokeredMessage</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>CorrelationFilter</parameterReference>: A type of Filter that matches <legacyItalic>CorrelationId</legacyItalic> property of <legacyItalic>BrokeredMessage</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: Action: <parameterReference>String</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: Action: <parameterReference>String</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: The <legacyItalic>Action</legacyItalic> property references an instance of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyItalic>Action</legacyItalic> property references an instance of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: The following type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> are provided.
trans-unit.target: The following type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> are provided.

trans-unit.source: Default is an instance of <legacyItalic>EmptyRuleAction</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: Default is an instance of <legacyItalic>EmptyRuleAction</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>SqlFilterAction</parameterReference>: A type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> that is represented by SQL expression.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>SqlFilterAction</parameterReference>: A type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> that is represented by SQL expression.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about SqlFilterAction syntax, see <externalLink><linkText>SqlRuleAction.SqlExpression Property</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.sqlruleaction.sqlexpression.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed information about SqlFilterAction syntax, see <externalLink><linkText>SqlRuleAction.SqlExpression Property</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.sqlruleaction.sqlexpression.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>EmptyRuleAction</parameterReference>: A type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> that represents an empty action.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>EmptyRuleAction</parameterReference>: A type of <legacyItalic>FilterAction</legacyItalic> that represents an empty action.
